scripts.dev: bunx nodemon --ext ts --ignore dist --exec bun run build
scripts.db:push: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--import tsx" pnpm exec drizzle-kit push --config drizzle.config.ts
scripts.db:generate: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--import tsx" pnpm exec drizzle-kit generate --config drizzle.config.ts
scripts.db:migrate: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--import tsx" pnpm exec drizzle-kit migrate --config drizzle.config.ts
